sentence.Network_en: John Bardeen was also co-developer of the theory of superconductivity.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰·巴丁也是超导电性理论的创立者之一。

sentence.Network_en: These two basic electrodynamic properties give superconductivity its unique interest.
sentence.Network_cn: 上述两个基本电动力学性质使超导电性具有无比的重要性.

sentence.Network_en: Superconductivity means no electrical resistance, and that in turn means no wasted power.
sentence.Network_cn: 超导性意味着零电阻, 也就意味着没有能量的浪费.

entry.def: Superconductivity is the ability of certain metals to allow electricity to pass through them without any resistance at very low temperatures.

means.word_mean: 1. the disappearance of electrical resistance at very low temperatures

auth_sentence.content: If we can create superconductivity and levitation at room temperature the benefit for human kind could be enormous.
